canCall(address,address,bytes4).notice: Verify if the caller can access to a function into a contract.

getCapabilityRoles(address,bytes4).notice: Return roles capables to call a function inside a contract.

setOwner(address).notice: Change the owner of this contract.

setPublicCapability(address,bytes4,bool).notice: Define public access to a function into a contract.

userdoc.notice: Facilitates access to lists of user roles and capabilities.
